sentences.en: And eke my name be wiped out likewise.
sentences.cn: 而我的名字也将这般枯萎.

sentences.en: And this faire couple eke to shroud themselves were fain.
sentences.cn: 这漂亮的一对也欣然地隐蔽自己.

sentences.en: Even in China's richest city, huge numbers of people eke out a very modest existence.
sentences.cn: 在这个中国最富裕的城市, 还是有很多人勉强维生.

sentences.en: His defense during the final match was superb, allowing him to eke out a draw.
sentences.cn: 决赛中的出色防守使他保住了平局.

sentences.en: In certain cases, education and enlightenment can serve to eke out evil.
sentences.cn: 在某种情况下, 教育和智力都是可以起济恶的作用的.

sentences.en: Many workers can only eke out their redundancy money for about 10 weeks.
sentences.cn: 很多工人手头的遣散费仅够维持10个星期左右。

sentences.en: Migrants send home cash that helps eke out low village incomes.
sentences.cn: 流动劳工往家里汇款,以弥补低下的农村收入.

sentences.en: That forced peasant farmers to try to eke a living off steep hillsides .
sentences.cn: 那迫使农民们努力在陡峭的山坡上勉强维持生计。

sentences.en: The crew started to eke out there scanty supply of fresh water.
sentences.cn: 船员们开始节约使用储量不多的淡水.

sentences.en: They eke out a bare existence ( ie They scarcely manage ) on his low salary.
sentences.cn: 他们靠他微薄的薪金勉强口.

sentences.en: They eke out a bare existence on his low salary.
sentences.cn: 他们靠他微薄的薪金勉强糊口.

sentences.en: They had to eke out a livinga tiny income.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不靠微薄收入勉强度日.

sentences.en: To eke out her meager pay, Betty turned to writing.
sentences.cn: 贝蒂为了弥补微薄的工资收入, 搞起写作来.

sentences.en: To my surprise I eke out a small sound.
sentences.cn: 出乎我意料之外的是,我只能勉强吹出细小的声音.

sentences.en: We must try to eke out our water supply.
sentences.cn: 我们必须尽量节约用水.

phrases.tran_cn: v. 竭力维持；弥补…的不足

trans.tran_cn: （靠节省用量）使…的供应持久，节约使用，竭力维持生计，勉强度日
